arts.ttl: Hansi Flick Reveals Lamine Yamal Availability for Barcelona vs. Getafe
arts.sum: The 18-year-old star is still recovering from an injury picked up representing Spain.

arts.ttl: Flick delivers Yamal injury update ahead of Getafe contest
arts.sum: Barcelona head coach Hansi Flick confirms that Lamine Yamal will once again be unavailable for the Catalan giants in Sunday's La Liga encounter with Getafe.

arts.ttl: Flick talks Cubarsi, Lamine, Gavi, Balde, Rashford, Ballon d’Or ahead of Barcelona vs Getafe
arts.sum: FC Barcelona will look to extend their unbeaten streak in the new season when they take on Getafe at Estadi Johan Cruyff on Sunday night. Coming off a tough contest against Newcastle United in the UEFA Champions League and the fatigue from the travel, changes are likely to be made for tomorrow’s game. arts.ttl: Barcelona defender set to miss Getafe clash after not training with group
arts.sum: With just a day to go before Barcelona face Getafe at Estadi Johan Cruyff, it looks increasingly unlikely that Pau Cubarsi will be available, reports Mundo Deportivo. The young defender was forced off at St. James’ Park after feeling discomfort in his left knee. In Saturday’s training session, the final one before Sunday’s fixture, Cubarsi […] The post Barcelona defender set to miss Getafe clash after not training with group appeared first on Barca Universal.

arts.ttl: Barcelona 17-year-old gem dealing with foot discomfort, likely to miss Getafe game
arts.sum: Pedro Fernandez ‘Dro’, one of the standout performers of Barcelona’s pre-season, has been absent from both the first team and the reserve side in recent matches. The 17-year-old wonderkid suffered a knock in Barça Atletic’s game against Porreres on 7 September and has not been a part of any matchday squads since. arts.ttl: Report – Barcelona coach Hansi Flick’s plan to break down the Getafe defence
arts.sum: Barcelona are eyeing their third back-to-back win in all competitions as they take on Getafe on Sunday. Having scored eight goals in the last two matches, Barça will be confident heading into this game, but should be wary of Getafe’s infamous low-block defence, masterminded by coach Jose Bordalas. arts.ttl: Barcelona defensive prodigy poised to start against Getafe
arts.sum: Following wins over Valencia and Newcastle United, Barcelona will look to continue their winning momentum as they take on Getafe at home this weekend.
